sentences.en: An absence without adequate excuse could result in the suspension of a financial stipend.
sentences.cn: 无正当理由的缺课者可能要受到停发津贴的处罚.

sentences.en: Depending on the filed of their research, extra stipend may be available.
sentences.cn: 该校不保证学生能取得此助学金,端由研究计画主持教授决定.

sentences.en: Favourable stipend and professional training provided here.
sentences.cn: 有利提供的俸给和专业培训这里.

sentences.en: I am writing to you to apply for a fellowship with a stipend in your university.
sentences.cn: 我想来贵校进修,并盼能给予助学金.

sentences.en: I receive a transportation stipend of NT $ 5000 every month.
sentences.cn: 我每个月会领到五千元的交通津贴.

sentences.en: I was given a stipend to cover the expenses during the business trip.
sentences.cn: 我拿到了定期津贴,其中包括了出差的补贴.

sentences.en: Phelps receives a monthly stipend of dollar 1,750 from the organization.
sentences.cn: 菲尔普斯从组织那儿收到1,750美元的一每月的津贴.

sentences.en: Rural medics an average stipend of $ 65 a year, leading some to overcharge their patients.
sentences.cn: 农村医生每年的薪水是65美金, 这导致了对病人的超标收费.

sentences.en: Rural medics get an average stipend of $ 65 a year, leading some to overcharge their patients.
sentences.cn: 这些医生每年仅得到65美元, 这导致他们向病人高收费.

sentences.en: Rural medics get an average stipend of 65 dollars a year, leading some to overcharge their patients.
sentences.cn: 乡村医生每年的平均收入为65美元, 所以一些人对接诊者多收费.

sentences.en: Stop! Hunting down wild dogs, stipend $ 300 NT per dog.
sentences.cn: 公所有赏! 捕野狗一只三百!

sentences.en: There will moreover be a stipend of fifty pounds a year.
sentences.cn: 每年还有五十镑一笔薪俸.

sentences.en: This sum was nearly a third of his total stipend.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱几乎是他全部津贴的三分之一。

sentences.en: WAO will contribute a monthly stipend and yearly travel expenses.
sentences.cn: WAO将按月支付薪水和一年一次的旅途交通费用.

sentences.en: We offer a monthly stipend plus a travel allowance.
sentences.cn: 我们提供每月的薪水,外加旅游津贴.

words.tran_cn: 奖学金；固定薪金；定期津贴；养老金

trans.tran_en: an amount of money paid regularly to someone, especially a priest, as a salary or as money to live on
